title: Privacy Vault UI Integration
description: Integrate VaultOverlay component into settings panel with status indicator and management UI. VaultOverlay component and backend API already exist but are not connected to the settings UI.
acceptance_criteria: Vault status indicator shows locked/unlocked state
Settings UI allows vault initialization and unlock
Remove 'Coming soon' badge from Privacy Vault section
Wire vault status to backend /api/vault/status endpoint
notes: VaultOverlay component exists at frontend/src/components/vault/VaultOverlay.tsx. Backend vault API is functional. This PBI is for UI integration only.
